text: allaah ne udaaharan diya hai unake lie, jo kaafir ho gaye noohî€¼ kee patnee tatha loot kee patnee ka. jo donon vivaah mein theen do bhakton ke, hamaare sadaachaaree bhakton mein se. phir donon ne vishvaasaghaat[1] kiya unase. to donon unake, allaah ke yahaan kuchh kaam nahin aaye tatha (donon striyon se) kaha gaya ki pravesh kar jao narak mein pravesh karane vaalon ke saath
